"AC (ARKS Cash) and the AC Shop":
"AC, or \"ARKS Cash\", is a currency purchased with real money that you can spend on a number of convenience items and services to help you enjoy the game.

You can charge (buy) AC by selecting \"AC & SG Shop\" from the Main Menu, then selecting \"Charge AC\"."

"In the AC Shop, you can spend AC on things like Premium Sets, which come with a variety of benefits, and Inventory expansions.

Alternatively, you can draw from an AC Scratch for a chance at all kinds of rewards, like appealing cosmetics and items that will help you on your adventure."
